column4: is it possible to have a different wallpaper on each virtual desktop?
if you use compiz + you don't mind not using your desktop for icons then Yes, see http://sites.google.com/site/alucidfs/how-i-do/multiple-compiz-backgrounds
and any possiblity to also have icons available? maybe there is some upcoming version that supports this behaviour?
not that i'm aware of -- it's icons on desktop OR multiple wallpaper, not both
